title: How to join Coding Ninjas core team?
description: You can join the Coding Ninjas core team at Central University of Haryana by participating in the annual recruitment process, which is open to students from any field of study. Keep an eye on the official website for recruitment notifications and fill out the form provided on the website to be considered for the next round.

title: How to apply for the interview?
description: To apply for the interview, visit the club's website during the recruitment period and fill out the application form. Ensure you submit the form before the deadline to be considered for the recruitment process.

title: What skills are required to join Coding Ninjas CUH?
description: While coding skills are essential, the club values problem-solving abilities, teamwork, and creativity. Candidates from any field of study are encouraged to apply, and previous experience in programming or participation in coding events is an advantage.

title: Is prior coding experience necessary to apply?
description: No, prior coding experience is not mandatory. The club welcomes students from all disciplines, and the recruitment process focuses on potential and enthusiasm for learning coding and related skills. However, having basic programming knowledge can be beneficial.

title: What opportunities are available for members after joining?
description: Members gain access to various learning resources, workshops, and coding events. They also get to collaborate on projects, participate in hackathons, and develop leadership skills by taking on responsibilities within the club.
